text: George Draper Dayton (March 6, 1857 â€“ February 18, 1938) was an American businessman and philanthropist. He was famous for being the founder of Dayton's department store, which later became Target Corporation. ==References== Category:1857 births Category:1938 deaths Category:Philanthropists from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from Minneapolis
